Source: index.js

const compliments = require("./data/compliments.js");
const insults = require("./data/insults.js");
const pack = require("../package.json");

const Compliment = () => {
  return compliments[Math.floor(Math.random() * compliments.length)];
};

const Insult = () => {
  return insults[Math.floor(Math.random() * insults.length)];
};

module.exports = {
  Compliments: compliments,
  Insults: insults,
  Compliment: Compliment,
  Insult: Insult,
  version: pack.version
};

/**
 * The JS file with every compliment that's added to the array to pick a random one.
 * @constant {File} compliments
 */

/**
 * The JS file with every insult that's added to the array to pick a random one.
 * @constant {File} insults
*/

/**
 * The package.json file.
 * @constant {File} pack
 */

/**
 * The function to give a random compliment.
 * @function Compliment
 */

/**
 * The function to give a random insult.
 * @function Insult
*/
